cover.title: Innovation and Technology to Revolutionize Patient Recruitment in Latin America
cover.subtitle: Our solutions combine data analysis, specialized communication, and humanized patient management in a modern and secure technological environment. Let's work together!

resources.title: The effectiveness and precision of our comprehensive solutions make us the leading company in the region.

patient.name: Patient Centricity
patient.description: We make sure to consider the needs and address our strategies from their perspective.

innovation.name: Technological Innovation
innovation.description: We accelerate patient recruitment thanks to completely innovative technological solutions.

precision.name: Precision and Efficiency
precision.description: Our technological approach guarantees the effectiveness and quality of our recruitment.

catchment.name: Selective Recruitment
catchment.description: Our management and data analysis allow us to have a precise and effective recruitment of patients, reducing the failure rate.

realTime.name: Real-time Monitoring
realTime.description: We record, monitor, and analyze training and patient management metrics in real-time, allowing us to be reactive and strategic.

automatization.name: Automation and Speed
automatization.description: We optimize our processes and implement innovative digital tools to save time and costs.

sites.title: From Latin America to Latin America
sites.subtitle: Understanding the cultural heterogeneity of the region, the characteristics of the healthcare system, and the challenges of patients in each country is key to the effectiveness of our work.

esclerosis.title: RR Multiple Sclerosis
esclerosis.text: We contributed 50% of the target country in just 7 months of active campaign.
esclerosis.label: Guatemala 7 months

crohn.title: Crohn's Disease
crohn.text: We contributed 75% of the target country in just 11 months of active campaign.
crohn.label: Mexico 11 months

esquizofrenia.title: Schizophrenia
esquizofrenia.text: We contributed 68% of the target country in just 5 months of active campaign.
esquizofrenia.label: Latam 5 months

medicalNetwork.title: Network of Referring Doctors
medicalNetwork.description: We have a network of medical specialists in different therapeutic areas interested in offering their patients the opportunity to participate in clinical trials. These professionals, previously informed about the available research protocols, have the possibility to refer potential candidates through our secure electronic platforms and access real-time patient follow-up at each stage of the protocol.

clinicalSearch.text: Discover the first and only online clinical trial search engine with user-friendly language for Latin America.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.thanks: Thank you very much for registering! In your email inbox, you will find important information.
